chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
x: X
A: list X

Goal:
eq_dec X -> dec (x el A)

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
dec = fun X : Prop => {X} + {~ X} : Prop -> Type Arguments dec _%type_scope
list_eq_dec : forall X : Type, eq_dec X -> eq_dec list X
sum_eq_dec : forall X Y : Type, eq_dec X -> eq_dec Y -> eq_dec X + Y
prod_eq_dec : forall X Y : Type, eq_dec X -> eq_dec Y -> eq_dec X * Y
Dec : forall X : Prop, dec X -> dec X
impl_dec : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X -> Y)
option_eq_dec : forall X : Type, eq_dec X -> eq_dec option X
and_dec : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X /\ Y)
iff_dec : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X <-> Y)
or_dec : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X \/ Y)
dec_DM_impl : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> ~ (X -> Y) -> X /\ ~ Y
dec_DM_and : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> ~ (X /\ Y) -> ~ X \/ ~ Y
dec_DN : forall X : Prop, dec X -> ~ ~ X -> X
not_dec : forall X : Prop, dec X -> dec (~ X)
eqType_CS : forall X : Type, eq_dec X -> eqType
EqType : forall X : Type, eq_dec X -> eqType
Dec_auto : forall (X : Prop) (d : dec X), X -> Dec X
Dec_auto_not : forall (X : Prop) (d : dec X), ~ X -> ~ Dec X
in_in_remove : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x <> y -> x el l -> x el remove eq_dec y l
map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, a el ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [X : Type x : X A : list X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type x : X A : list X |- Type] ?f : [X : Type x : X A : list X |- ?A -> ?B] ?g : [X : Type x : X A : list X |- ?A -> ?B] ?l : [X : Type x : X A : list X |- list ?A]
notin_remove : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ x el l -> remove eq_dec x l = l
in_remove : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x el remove eq_dec y l -> x el l /\ x <> y
NoDup_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), ~ x el l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l)
Exists_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> P0 (x :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Exists P l -> P0 l
in_prod : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), x el l -> y el l' -> (x, y) el list_prod l l'
NoDup_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> SProp), P [] -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ x el l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ x el l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
remove_length_lt : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), x el l -> | remove eq_dec x l | < | l |
Dec_reflect : forall (X : Prop) (d : dec X), Dec X < -> X
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
in_combine_l : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), (x, y) el combine l l' -> x el l
in_combine_r : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), (x, y) el combine l l' -> y el l'
remove_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ x el remove eq_dec x l
in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (x : A), x el l -> f x el map f l
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> Exists P (x :: l) Arguments Exists [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_hd [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
count_occ_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), x el l < -> count_occ eq_dec l x > 0
Exists_cons_hd : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l)
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 [] -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l)
Inductive NoDup (A : Type) : list A -> Prop := NoDup_nil : NoDup [] | NoDup_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ x el l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l) Arguments NoDup [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments NoDup_nil _%type_scope Arguments NoDup_cons [A]%type_scope _ [l]%list_scope
count_occ_not_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ x el l < -> count_occ eq_dec l x = 0
